title: In General
text: A tax is hereby imposed for each taxable year on the taxable income of every corporation.

logical_structure.result: A tax is hereby imposed for each taxable year on the taxable income of every corporation.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 11(a)Corporations In General—A  tax is hereby imposed for each taxable year on the
                  taxable income of every  corporation.

title: Of Tax
text: The amount of the tax imposed by subsection (a) shall be 21 percent of taxable income.

logical_structure.result: The amount of the tax imposed by subsection (a) shall be 21 percent of taxable income.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 11(b)Amount Of Tax—The amount of the tax imposed by
                  subsection (a) shall be 21 percent of taxable income.

text: Subsection(a)shall not apply to a corporation subject to a tax imposed by——section594(relating to mutual savings banks conducting life insurance business),—subchapter L (sec.801and following, relating to insurance companies), or—subchapter M (sec.851and following, relating to regulated investment companies and real estate investment trusts).

logical_structure.result: Subsection(a)shall not apply to a corporation subject to a tax imposed by——section594(relating to mutual savings banks conducting life insurance business),—subchapter L (sec.801and following, relating to insurance companies), or—subchapter M (sec.851and following, relating to regulated investment companies and real estate investment trusts).

cross_references.reason: subject to a tax imposed by——...

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 11(c)Exceptions—Subsection(a)shall
                  not apply to a corporation subject to a tax imposed by—I.R.C. § 11(c)(1)—section594(relating to mutual savings
                     banks conducting life insurance business),I.R.C. § 11(c)(2)—subchapter  L (sec.801and following, relating to
                     insurance companies), orI.R.C. § 11(c)(3)—subchapter  M (sec.851and following, relating to
                     regulated investment companies and  real estate investment trusts).

title: Corporations
text: In the case of a foreign corporation, the taxes imposed by subsection(a)and section55shall apply only as provided by section882.

logical_structure.result: In the case of a foreign corporation, the taxes imposed by subsection(a)and section55shall apply only as provided by section882.

cross_references.reason: all apply only as provided by...

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 11(d)Foreign Corporations—In  the case of a foreign corporation,
                  the taxes imposed by subsection(a)and
                  section55shall apply only as
                  provided by section882.
